about_the_game:
About the App:

Cinehome VR Theatre is a VR Media player, Watch movies from the comfort of your own living space.

Supports MP4, MOV and AVI files formats, Use the wrist activated scene controls to access settings for display or audio and use the file browser to access locally stored media to be displayed on the configurable display which brings a whole new meaning to home theatre.

Customize your own VR Theatre:

6 different finishes for floors and walls
3 Theatre sizes
Curved or flat display
Select your preferred seating position
Select moodlighting for enhanced experience.

Localized for 5 languages: English, German, Spanish, Korean and Simplified Chinese.

Supports a large assortment of VR including: HTC Vives, Oculus and Valve Index.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 2700X
  • Graphics: GTX 2070 or AMd equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest, HTC Vive, Valve Index
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5700X
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3070, AMD Radeon 6800XT or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest, HTC Vive, Valve Index
